interactivity.to_get_this_event: Autoplays after " Three Words " . This event is the final event in an event chain started from " Little Miracles " .

progression.synopsis: Sensei wakes up next to Chika . When she eventually wakes up, they talk about whether or not to tell anyone about the progress of their relationship — Chika wants to at least tell Yumi , but Sensei thinks that it would cause problems. They compromise — Chika won't actively tell Yumi, but won't lie about it either, and will make sure Yumi doesn't tell anyone else. Chika is a bit sad about having to leave the onsen after having so much fun. Before they go, they meet Tsubasa and Tsukasa , who heard them playing "games" overnight. Chika and Tsubasa exchange contact information.
trivia: Chika's first phone message is available after this event.

changelog: This Event was added in Update .15p1.
